greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = (1 - (-12)^n)/13.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..900
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-11,12).
maple: a:=n->sum ((-12)^j, j=0..n): seq(a(n), n=0..25); # _Zerinvary Lajos_, Dec 16 2008
program: (Sage) [gaussian_binomial(n,1,-12) for n in range(1,18)] # _Zerinvary Lajos_, May 28 2009
(MAGMA) I:=[1,-11]; [n le 2 select I[n] else -11*Self(n-1)+12*Self(n-2): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 22 2012
results.author: _Olivier Gérard_
